mapper.insert: insert into baseSalaryInfo ( baseSalary, minusHour, plusHour, wkPeriodFrom, wkPeriodTo, status, insertDate, ) values #{baseSalary}, #{wkPeriodFrom}, #{wkPeriodTo}, #{minusHour}, #{plusHour}, #{status}, date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'),

select employeeID as employeeID, baseSalary as baseSalary, minusHour as minusHour, plusHour as plusHour, wkPeriodFrom as wkPeriodFrom, wkPeriodTo as wkPeriodTo, status as status, insertDate as insertDate, updateDate as updateDate, baseSalaryID as baseSalaryID,
from ems.baseSalaryInfo where employeeID=#{employeeID}

update baseSalaryInfo set baseSalary=#{baseSalary}, minusHour=#{minusHour}, plusHour=#{plusHour}, wkPeriodFrom=#{wkPeriodFrom}, wkPeriodTo=#{wkPeriodTo}, status=#{status}, updateDate=date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') where employeeID=#{employeeID}
